alert.note: Alert for Clark; Crawford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 04 at 2:05PM CDT until November 05 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 4 PM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central, southeast and west central Illinois. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 4 PM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Showers and thunderstorms will accompany the windy conditions, and may locally enhance winds.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
